member.name: M:BeicipFranLabERP.Controllers.AdminSettings.BackupManagementController.SaveBackupSchedule(BeicipFranLabERP.ViewModel.SaveBackupSchedule)
member.summary: Save The Backup Schedule and according to this data backup is automatically generated in the destination folder
member.param: Parameter Name Interval can be 'Once daily' or 'Weekly'(Required) ---- Parameter Name Destination is the destination folder location where backup is to be stored e.g 'E://NewFolder//' (Required) ---- Parameter Name Backup_Type has 2 options which is 'full' for the database backup and 'log' is for logs only backup

member.name: P:BeicipFranLabERP.ViewModel.SaveBackupSchedule.Backup_Type
member.summary: has 2 options which is 'full' for the database backup and 'log' is for logs only backup

member.name: P:BeicipFranLabERP.ViewModel.SaveBackupSchedule.DestinationName
member.summary: is the destination folder location where backup is to be stored e.g 'E://NewFolder//'
